name: Stream Out
description:
Exports player account information to image and text files which can be used in OBS and other streaming software.
Some update in real-time because they reflect your character's current state while others update every 5 minutes as they reflect data from your overall account.

account.details: Always required if any other permission is present.

characters.details: Needed to record your death count.

progression.details: Needed to record your kill count in PvP and WvW.

pvp.details: Needed to request your SPvP standings.

wallet.details: Needed to record the amount of gold, silver and copper in your possession.

guilds.details: Needed to request image resources required to render your current represented guild's' emblem.
